channel.title: Wiki edit bug
channel.description:
On the Download page, when I click edit next to the "Verify the Whonix images" section:
https://www.whonix.org/w/index.php?title=Download&action=edit&section=3
It brings the code of the next section: "Install Whonix"

item.title: Wiki edit bug
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
It’s because I messed up the

Tags (mediwiki translation extension). Please use the big main edit button at the bottom in meanwhile.

Maybe you would be interested to learn the translation extension? That’s a task I want to get done for a long time already, but don’t get to it.

Read full topic
